maml:description.maml:para: The Get-AzBillingAccount cmdlet gets billing accounts, user has access to.

maml:Description.maml:para: The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Include the address of the billing account.
Include the billing profiles under the billing account.
Include the billing profiles under billing account and invoices sections under them.
Name of a specific billing account.
List the billing entities under billing account which can be used as input to create subscription.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Include the address of the billing account.
Include the billing profiles under the billing account.
Include the billing profiles under billing account and invoices sections under them.
Name of a specific billing account.
List the billing entities under billing account which can be used as input to create subscription.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get all billing accounts user has access to.
Get the billing account with the specified name.
Get all billing accounts user has access to, and include the address in the result.
Get all billing accounts user has access to, and include the billing profiles in the result.
Get all billing accounts user has access to, and include the billing profiles and invoice sections under them in the result.
Get the billing account with the specified name, and include the address, billing profiles and invoice sections under them in the result.

maml:description.maml:para: Get billing invoices of the subscription. Get billing invoices of a billing account and billing profile
The Get-AzBillingInvoice cmdlet gets billing invoices of the subscription.

maml:Description.maml:para: The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Generate the download url of the invoices.
Get the latest invoice.
Name of a specific billing account to get invoices for.
Name of a specific billing profile to get invoices for.
Start date for invoice.
End date for invoice.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Generate the download url of the invoices.
Determines the maximum number of records to return.
Name of a specific billing account to get invoices for.
Name of a specific billing profile to get invoices for.
Start date for invoice.
End date for invoice.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Generate the download url of the invoices.
Name of a specific invoice to get or the most recent if not specified.
Name of a specific billing account to get invoices for.
Name of a specific billing profile to get invoices for.
Start date for invoice.
End date for invoice.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Generate the download url of the invoices.
Get the latest invoice.
Determines the maximum number of records to return.
Name of a specific invoice to get or the most recent if not specified.
Name of a specific billing account to get invoices for.
Name of a specific billing profile to get invoices for.
Start date for invoice.
End date for invoice.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get the latest invoice of the subscription.
Get the invoice of the subscription with the specified name.
Get all available invoices of the subscription in reverse chronological order beginning with the most recent invoice without download Url.
Get most recent 10 invoices of the subscription and include the download Url in the result.
Get the specific invoice by name and include download url in the result.
Get invoices by billing account name and include download url for each invoice in the result.
Get specific invoice by invoice name and billing account name and include download url for each invoice in the result.
Get latest invoice by billing account name and include download url for invoice in the result.
Get most recent 10 invoices of the specific billing account and specific billing profile and include the download Url in the result.
Get latest invoice by billing account name and billing profile name and include download url for invoice in the result.
Get invoices by billing account name and billing profile name for a billing period specified by perioStart date and periodEnd date.

maml:description.maml:para: Get billing periods of the subscription.
The Get-AzBillingPeriod cmdlet gets billing periods of the subscription.

maml:Description.maml:para: The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Determine the maximum number of records to return.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Name of a specific billing period to get.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Determine the maximum number of records to return.
Name of a specific billing period to get.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get all available billing periods of the subscription.
Get the billing period of the subscription with the specified name.
Get at most 2 billing periods of the subscription.

maml:description.maml:para: The Get-AzBillingProfile cmdlet gets billing profiles under the specified billing account.

maml:Description.maml:para: The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Name of the specific billing account.
Include the invoices sections under billing profile.
Name of a specific billing profile.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Name of the specific billing account.
Include the invoices sections under billing profile.
Name of a specific billing profile.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get all billing profiles under the specified billing account.
Get the billing profile with the specified name.
Get all billing profiles under specified billing account, and include the invoice sections in the result.
Get the billing profile with the specified name, and include the invoice sections in the result.

maml:description.maml:para: The Get-AzEnrollmentAccount cmdlet gets enrollment accounts.

maml:Description.maml:para: ObjectId of a specific enrollment account to get.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
ObjectId of a specific enrollment account to get.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-AzEnrollmentAccount
ObjectId PrincipalName -------- ------------- dbd8453d-071f-4fb4-8e01-c99f5b067649 jason@contoso.onmicrosoft.com 7ff524ac-a0de-4402-876f-934ccee3b601 carol@contoso.onmicrosoft.com

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get all available enrollment accounts.

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 2 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Get-AzEnrollmentAccount -ObjectId dbd8453d-071f-4fb4-8e01-c99f5b067649
ObjectId PrincipalName -------- ------------- dbd8453d-071f-4fb4-8e01-c99f5b067649 jason@contoso.onmicrosoft.com

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get the enrollment account with the specified object id.

maml:description.maml:para: The Get-AzInvoiceSection cmdlet gets invoice sections under the specified billing profile.

maml:Description.maml:para: The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Name of the specific billing account.
Name of the specific billing profile.
Name of a specific invoice section.
The credentials, account, tenant, and subscription used for communication with azure
Name of the specific billing account.
Name of the specific billing profile.
Name of a specific invoice section.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Get all invoice sections under the specified billing profile.
Get the invoice section with the specified name.
